document.full_text: the head of the company that owns the idaho silver mine where a worker has been trapped underground for eight days said he still hopes rescuers will bring the miner safely home to his family.
document.title: company owner hoping for "miracle" with trapped idaho miner
lines_and_colors: the head of the company that owns the idaho silver mine where a worker has been trapped underground for eight days said he still hopes rescuers will bring the miner safely home to his family.
